newsitem.title: ESTONIA: FATKO TO OFFER SHARES IN APRIL - REPORT.
newsitem.headline: FATKO TO OFFER SHARES IN APRIL - REPORT.

text.p: Fatko, the local dealership for Nissan cars, said it will offer its shares to the public in April and seek a listing on the secondary market of the Tallinn stock exchange, newspaper Aripaev said on Tuesday.
The chairman of the board, Leho Siimsen said that Fakto will issue 400,000 new shares to increase its equity capital by 33 percent, the business paper quoted him as saying.
Provided the share offering is sucessful, the retail company will seek a listing on the secondary market of the Tallinn stock exchange, the newspaper added.
The company plans to use the funds generated by the share issue to invest in the construction of new Nissan service centres, the newspaper quoted him as adding.
